paper_abstract: In the paper, it is proved that a planar graph of maximum degree Delta >= 7 is (Delta + 1)-totally-colorable if no 3-cycle has a common vertex with a 4-cycle or no 3-cycle is adjacent to a cycle of length less than 6. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Total coloring of planar graphs with maximum degree 7
